scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint:check
scripts.examples:timer-benchmark:deno: if [ -x "$(command -v gnuplot)" ]; then deno run --allow-env --allow-run=gnuplot --allow-read --allow-write=output ./lib/examples/timer-benchmark.js; else deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write=output ./lib/examples/timer-benchmark.js; fi
scripts.test: npm run examples:timer-benchmark:bun && npm run examples:timer-benchmark:deno && npm run examples:timer-benchmark:node
